ProjectTitle: Modelling and understanding aesthetic preferences for visual patterns, photographs and paintings: Comparing human perceivers with convolutional neural networks
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/07/2022
The documentation about the dataset looks complete but to ensure that other people can replicate your research it would be good that you also provide the analysis script(s) (e.g., R code, SPSS syntax) and that you note with which software version you worked (and if applicable also R package version).
For sharing of the data, you could consider to use the new KU Leuven data repository RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/rdr).
label: good with suggestions
